underlying_goal: Understand and map the variable dependencies between two state machines (8-step registration workflow and 19-item check flow) in a Japanese project, then create a plan to fix detected issues in the variable mapping
friction_detail: A few Glob/Grep searches returned empty results due to incorrect or mismatched file paths.
brief_summary: User wanted to visualize state machine diagrams and map variable dependencies between two workflows, and Claude successfully explored the codebase and produced a concrete implementation plan documenting the cross-workflow variable mapping and fixes.
